biocontainers.name: monocle3-cli
biocontainers.summary: A set of wrappers for individual components of the monocle3 package. functions r packages are hard to call when building workflows outside of r, so this package adds a set of simple wrappers with robust argument parsing. intermediate steps are currently monocle3 r objects, but the ultimate objective is to have language-agnostic intermediate formats allowing composite workflows using a variety of software packages.
